title: Design-Based Research Program for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen online instructional design competencies for university students in educational settings. Emphasizes practical approaches responding to post-pandemic digital education environments

learning_goals: Participants can accurately describe core principles for designing online learning environments (e.g., interaction design, content structuring) with over 80% accuracy
Participants can design three or more online lesson scenarios using educational technology tools (e.g., LMS, asynchronous collaboration platforms)
Participants can develop prototypes (questionnaires/observation checklists) to evaluate the effectiveness of educational programs by applying design-based research (DBR) methodologies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
